quotes.text: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.text: Deep breathing is our nervous system's love language.
quotes.author: Dr. Lauren Fogel Mersy

quotes.text: Self-care is how you take your power back.
quotes.author: Lalah Delia

quotes.text: The best way to find out whether you're on the right path? Stop looking at the path.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.text: You can do anything once you stop trying to do everything!
quotes.author: Eric Barker

quotes.text: Every person on this earth is full of great possibilities that can be realized through imagination, effort, and perseverance.
quotes.author: Scott Barry Kaufmann

quotes.text: Permit yourself to change your mind when something is no longer working for you.
quotes.author: Nedra Glover Tawwab

quotes.text: The truth is, bad things don't affect us as profoundly as we expect them to. That's true of good things, too. We adapt very quickly to either.
quotes.author: Daniel Gilbert

quotes.text: When we are open to new possibilities, we find them. Be open and skeptical of everything.
quotes.author: Todd Kashdan

quotes.text: Genuine feelings cannot be produced, nor can they be eradicatedâ€¦ the body sticks to the facts.
quotes.author: Alice Miller

quotes.text: How hurtful it can be to deny one's true self and live a life of lies just to appease others.
quotes.author: June Ahern

quotes.text: Reality denied comes back to haunt.
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick
